title: Coast to Coast Radio Program! Commercial Free! Feb 24th thru Mar
description:
Here are eight more broadcasts of the ever-expanding C2C! Download, SEED, and Enjoy! Thanks in advance to all the seeders and those who upload these to the multiple torrent sites out there. I, as well as many others, really appreciate it. Stokeman Out...... Until next week my friends! 

Sunday February 24th, 2008
Black Ops Patches and Torture Taxis
Artist, writer, and experimental geographer Trevor Paglen joined host George Knapp (email) to discuss his research into black ops programs and CIA-sponsored ?Torture Taxis.? He noted the symbology of patches associated with military black ops programs... 
Host: George Knapp
Guest(s): Trevor Paglen, Tim Crawford

Monday February 25th, 2008
The Human Brain
Neuroscientist Dr. Sam Wang discussed the human brain and how it&#039;s wired to experience various phenomena. Made of 3 lbs. of tissue with 100 billion neurons, the brain acts as an information processing device and filter. The truth is, we use all parts... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Dr. Sam Wang, Dr. Roy Spencer

Tuesday February 26th, 2008
RFID & Chip Implants
Consumer privacy advocate Katherine Albrecht presented an update on RFID and chip implants. Around 300 people have voluntarily had an RFID chip implanted in them, but they could be at an increased risk for cancer, she said. Studies of animals who&#039;ve...
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Gary Ridenour, Katherine Albrecht

Wednesday February 27th, 2008
Noah&#039;s Ark & Creationism
Author and researcher Walt Brown discussed Noah&#039;s Ark, the Great Flood and the debate between creationism and evolution. The Ark might be found surrounded by permanent icecap at 14,000 ft. elevation. Mount Ararat in Turkey or the Zagros Mountains in... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Dr. Walt Brown, Robert Reed, Christian Wilde

Thursday February 28th, 2008
World at Break Point
Author Steve Quayle discussed flash points of increasing tension around the world, including military unrest, financial meltdowns, and UFO activity. A recent fireball in the Pacific Northwest wasn&#039;t actually a meteor-- it was a UFO being shot down by... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Steve Quayle, Phyllis Curott

Friday February 29th, 2008
&#039;Leap Year&#039; Open Lines
During Open Lines, George asked for callers to share their most embarrassing moments as well as offered a &#039;Leap Year&#039; hotline for people who were born on February 29th. In the last half hour, George played a classic excerpt from one of Art Bell&#039;s... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Open Lines, David Flynn

Saturday March 1st, 2008
Neo-Darwinism & Academic Suppression
Film Producer of Expelled: No Intelligence Allowed (view movie trailers), Mark Mathis discussed his research into how the academic world treats university scientists, professors, and researchers who question the theory of Neo-Darwinism. According...
Host: Ian Punnett
Guest(s): Mark Mathis, William E. Marks

Sunday March 2nd, 2008
Pre-Death Encounters
Known for his compassionate care of hundreds of terminally-ill patients, Dr. John Lerma presented his research into hospice patients&#039; pre-death experiences. Such patients shared similarities in their experiences, typically seeing a "light entity" or... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Dr. John Lerma, Whitley Strieber, Jerome Corsi
